info.clustering: Aggregate points into clusters and display them as one symbol. Clusters use proportionally sized symbols and change dynamically with the map scale.
info.chartClustering: Show different categories of features within a cluster using a pie chart symbol. The pie chart symbol is proportionally sized based on the number of features in the cluster.
info.binning: Aggregate data to predefined cells, representing point, line, or polygon data as a gridded polygon layer. The bins show point, line, or polygon density in geographic space instead of screen space.

cluster.leNotSupportedMessage: Clustering is not supported while feature specific effects are enabled. Use layer effects or disable feature specific effects to use clustering.

bin.leNotSupportedMessage: Binning is not supported while feature specific effects are enabled. Use layer effects or disable feature specific effects to use binning.
bin.binSizeWarning: Changing the bin size will reset the bin style to its default.

fields.msg: Summary statistic fields show the sum, mean, minimum, maximum, or standard deviation of any numeric field in the layer. These fields can be used for styling, labeling and pop-ups.
fields.duplicateMsg: This statistic type and field name combination is already applied. Additional instances of a combination cannot be added.
